name: stone age ring
description:
The edgier off spring of the Nut Collection, this is the ring that launched the Stone Age.  In a rebellious response to the smooth surface of the Nut Ring the Stone Age Ring has a much rockier feel!

available in Sterling Silver, Sterling Silver with Green Patina, 18k Gold Plating, and Gunmetal Plating

~roughly 1/4" high
~comes in size 5 and 7

options.name: sterling silver with green patina - size 5
sterling silver with green patina - size 7

The Stone Age Bangle is a rebellious response to the smooth surface of the Nut Bangle with a little more edge and an over all rockier feel!

name: stone age neck plate
description:
Weren't you just saying the other day that you were looking for a versatile necklace you could wear either to dinner or with that old wife beater and jeans? Well... you're welcome!

available in Sterling Silver, Sterling Silver with Green Patina, 18k Gold Plated Brass Pendant and Vermeil Chain, Gunmetal Plated Brass Pendant and Sterling Silver Plated Chain, and Bronze Pendant with Green Patinad Sterling Silver Chain

~pendant 3" wide by roughly 1" at the highest point
~15" chain with lobster clasp

options.name: bronze pendant on sterling silver with green patina chain

name: stone age leather bracelet
description:
How would you like to know what it might feel like to be a cave woman for a day? Maybe more?  Well you may have come across just the accessory to help you live out that little fantasy of yours.  We must warn you though once you put it on, it might be hard to leave the house with out.

available with Sterling Silver, Sterling Silver with Green Patina, 18k Gold Plated Brass, Gunmetal Plated Brass, or Bronze beads on your choice of black, navy or maroon leather cord.

~bracelets have slip knot closure and adjust in length ranging from 2 1/2" to 4 1/2"

name: stone age small studs
description:
Whether you choose to rock a single or double these studs are a great way to add a little more Stone Age to your daily ensemble.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass with vermeil post and back and gunmetal plated brass stud with sterling silver plated post and back.

~measures roughly 1/4" high

name: stone age large studs
description:
Whether you choose to rock a single or double these studs are a great way to add a little more Stone Age to your daily ensemble.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass with vermeil post and back and gunmetal plated brass stud with sterling silver plated post and back.

name: stone age hoop earrings
description:
Time to upgrade those old hoops you’ve been wearing for years?  The Stone Age Hoops could just be the answer to your call.

available in Sterling Silver, Sterling Silver with Green Patina, 18k Gold Plated Brass Hoop with Sterling Silver post and catch, and Gunmetal Plated Brass Hoop with Sterling Silver post and plated catch.

~ hoop measures roughly 1/2" in diameter 
~ 1" from point to point

name: stackable caviar ring
description:
A variation on the original Caviar ring the Stackables are a great every day, unisex, alternative to their much more substantial cousin. The great thing about these smaller rings is, as their name states, they can be worn alone or stacked, enabling you to mix and match. The only thing limiting you to the amount of stacking you can do is the length of your finger!

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.


~ measures roughly 1/4" high
~ comes in size 6 1/2, 8 1/2, and 9 1/2


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

options.name: sterling silver with green patina size 6.5
sterling silver with green patina size 8.5
sterling silver with green patina size 9.5

name: caviar band
description:
Like Goldilocks and the Three Bears the Caviar ring may be too big while the Caviar Stackables may be too small, no matter how much you may stack them, in which case the Caviar Band should be just right! Like the Stackables, the Caviar Band is a great every day piece that is sure to become one of your most highly coveted accessories.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 1/2" high
~comes in size 4 1/2 and 7 1/2 


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

options.name: sterling silver with green patina size 4.5
sterling silver with green patina size 7.5

name: caviar cocktail ring
description:
Heavy Metal to the core, the Caviar is what I like to call a happy accident. While I was striving to create impeccably-carved corn and peas this little number began growing all on its own. Unbeknownst to me, among a heap of discarded wax in the corner of my bench, this heaping treasure was conceived. Sort of like fish eggs on the ocean floor... or something like that...

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ measures roughly 1" x 1 1/2” in diameter
~ comes in size 7 and 8 1/2

* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

options.name: sterling silver with green patina size 7
sterling silver with green patina size 8 1/2

name: caviar big ball bangle
description:
Caviar balls strung together make up this classic bangle with the signature Caviar texture.  As with all Brooklyn Heavy Metal pieces while the Caviar Big Ball Bangle can hold it's own it's always so much better stacked!

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 1/4" high

available in: 
-small - 2 1/4" diameter opening 
-medium - 2 1/2” diameter opening

* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

name: caviar studs
description:
Simple and sweet the Caviar Studs are perfect for work or play, a great alternative to your grandmothers old pearls.  But if you feel the urge to kick it old school the Caviar Solitaire can help complete that look, with a slight modern twist.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass with vermeil post and back and gunmetal plated brass.

~measures roughly 1/4" in diameter

name: caviar cluster studs
description:
Whether you're everyday is slightly more substantial than the average girl, or you've been looking for ways to ease your way into more of the heavy metal aesthetic the Caviar Cluster Studs are just the ticket!

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass with vermeil post and back and gunmetal plated brass.

~measures roughly 1/2" in diameter

options.name: 18k gold plated with vermeil posts and backs

name: caviar solitaire
description:
The Caviar Solitaire is the most delicate of the Caviar capturing the essence of the collection in a single ball.  Perfect for everyday this necklace is great alone or layered. For a more old school feel pair them with the Caviar Studs.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ caviar charm measures roughly measures roughly 1/4" in diameter 
~ with an 18” chain and spring ring clasp

* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

name: caviar leatherneck
description:
Yet another member of the Caviar family the Leatherneck offers up a slightly less metallic alternative to bringing more of that beloved Caviar into your life. Worn alone or with some of your other favorite chains this necklace was initially designed for the men who put the N in MeNtal. But after being admired and adorned by countless females (including myself) I realized I couldn't pigeon hole this great little piece like that so here is, one more for team unisex!

available in 18k Gold Plating, Sterling Silver, Sterling Silver with Green Patina, and Gunmetal Plating with a choice of leather cord colors. Let us know what color you would like and we will do our best to fulfill your desires.

~ removable size 8 1/2 caviar stackable ring 
~ on a 16" leather cord with lobster clasp
~available on black, navy or maroon leather

options.name: sterling silver with green patina on black leather
sterling silver with green patina on navy leather (shown)
sterling silver with green patina on maroon leather

name: caviar monocle necklace
description:
While not literally a monocle, I believe this necklace was definitely my subconscious paying a little Blond Ambition homage as a result of countless hours spent researching cone bras and bustiers for a Madonna costume I had to make for work. A little long and a little rock and roll this necklace can be worn by anyone, man woman or child. However, while the ring can be removed and worn alone, it may be more easily worn by a man since it is a size 9.5

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ size 9.5 caviar stackable ring 
~ on 35" chain with lobster clasp

* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

name: caviar pendant
description:
For those of you that appreciate the Heavy in Brooklyn Heavy Metal this necklace is for you, don't be fooled by it's pint size appearance this baby is solid! Another recent addition to the caviar collection the Caviar Pendant can be worn as a stand alone piece or layered any time, day or night. I would, however, recommend removing it before that Whirling Dervish class you were thinking about signing up for... that is if you want to remain conscious for the duration.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ caviar pendant measures roughly 1" x 1 1/4” in diameter 
~on a 27" chain with a spring ring clasp

* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

name: stackable nut ring
description:
if you enjoy a good game of Jenga you are no doubt going to enjoy wearing these delicate rings. Stack them alone or combine with any other number of your thinner Heavy Metal rings. Personally I don’t leave the house without four of these suckers framing a tentacle ring. 

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~1/16" high
~comes in size 6 and 7 1/2


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

for those of you fanatics who just can’t get enough, the double nut should be plenty! And since it is a 2-finger duster it can be worn on any number of finger combination's.

~ 1/2" high

name: nut bangle
description:
one of my favorites, this is another piece I will not walk out the door without, that is I guess unless I’m going to the gym or park to roll down a hill… like the band and stackable nuts it can be worn alone or piled as far as your forearm will permit.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

name: nut hoop earrings
description:
A little hoop with a little edge! And by that we mean those corners are roughly 120º to 130º with a post and catch closure.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass with vermeil post and back and gunmetal plated brass.

~hoop measures roughly 3/4" in diameter

name: bark wrap ring
description:
a delicate, rugged embrace, this ring flawlessly captures the raw beauty of birch it's like carrying a little piece of Mother Nature around with you on your finger.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass, gunmetal plated brass, rose gold plated brass, and rhodium plated brass**.

~ measures roughly 7/8" high
~ comes in size 5.5


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base 
** rhodium looks like sterling silver with a shinier finish

name: bark tube ring
description:
a slightly smoother side of birch, the tube may take a little getting used to due to its tall nature but once you do you won’t be able to fathom how you ever went a day without it! 

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass, gunmetal plated brass, rose gold plated brass, and rhodium plated brass**.

~measures roughly 1" high
~comes in size 7


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base 
** rhodium looks like sterling silver with a shinier finish

name: bark crown ring
description:
the most “finger” friendly, the crown tends to be adored and adorned by both men and women.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass, gunmetal plated brass, rose gold plated brass, and rhodium plated brass**.

~ roughly 3/4” high
~ comes in size 8



* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base
** rhodium looks like sterling silver with a shinier finish

name: bark mummy wrap ring
description:
This ring has been known to evoke memories of that time your dad took you to the children’s museum, when you were probably 7 years old, and he thought it would be a good idea to enter you in the mummy wrapping competition.  Basically who ever wrapped their child in a full roll of toilet paper the fastest was the winner.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 3/4" high
~ comes in size 8 1/2


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 1/2" high
~ comes in size 7 1/2


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

description:

description:
The widest of the Bark Band's the Wave Band not only has the texture of bark, but water as well, it's the perfect way to represent your two favorite natural elements.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

name: men's bark ring
description:
once compared to a piece of, slightly banged up, tin foil this ring captures the more subtle facets of the birch in a larger wrap style.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass, gunmetal plated brass, rose gold plated brass, and rhodium plated brass**.


~ roughly 3/4" high
~ comes in size 9.5


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base 
** rhodium looks like sterling silver with a shinier finish

name: rugged bark crown ring
description:
If you were playing king of the mountains and hadn’t come prepared and were therefor forced to fashion yourself a crown out of bark we would only imagine it might look something like this.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 1" high 
~ comes in size 10

* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

name: bark wall ring
description:
The Bark Wall Ring seems to just love our left index fingers!  While you can, and should, wear it on the finger of your choice, I mean rules were made to be broken right?, there is just something about how it seems to perfectly fit just right there. 

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 3/4" high at tallest point
~ comes in sizes 6, 7, 8

* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

name: bark wing ring
description:
With it’s feather like texture the Bark Wing looks as if it might fly off with your finger! Don’t worry though we assure you it won’t, or at least it hasn’t happened to anyone we know yet.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass, and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 3/4" high at tallest point
~ comes in sizes 6, 7, 8

The Bark Tower is definitely a statement piece and the chunkiest of the Bark Rings it will definitely add a little chunk to your jewelry trunk.

name: bark necklace
description:
Cast from a birch knot the Bark Necklace is definitely an every day staple for us.  It is also textured on both sides, one rough and the other swirly and smooth.  It's like getting 2 necklaces for the price of 1!

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass, gunmetal plated brass and bronze on a sterling silver chain with green patina*

~ bark charm measures roughly 2 1/2" x 1” in diameter 
~ with a 30" chain with lobster clasp


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

name: bark cuff
description:
If you were only had room on your body for one accessory for that new dress you just bought for that red carpet event coming up would be it! Large yet fairly light the Bark Cuff truly captures the delicate striking beauty of the birch.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ 2 1/2” diameter opening
~ roughly 2” wide

name: tentacle ring
description:
this little sucker makes a great everyday ring, whether worn alone or stacked. It is definitely a conversation starter and even if it doesn’t make people want to talk to you at least you will know there is some little cephalopod out there that loves you, by the hug your finger will receive every time you wear it.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina* and electroplated brass in 18k gold, gunmetal, rose gold, and rhodium**.

~roughly 3/4" high
~comes in a sizes 6, 7, 8

* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base 
** rhodium looks like sterling silver with a shinier finish

the user friendly love child of the Squid Bangle this lighter version can hold its own weight, without weighing you down, or share the stage with any number of your other favorite bracelets and bangles.

this statement bangle is sure to turn heads, however I wouldn’t suggest it for those who frequently blow off those bicep curls in the weight room.

** rhodium looks like sterling silver with a shinier finish

name: chicken bone ring
description:
Talk about grabbing inspiration from the world that surrounds you, the original bone for this ring was grabbed right off the plate of the designers chicken mole dinner at her local Brooklyn Mexican joint!

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

name: raccoon heart studs
description:
Meticulously chosen, the Raccoon Heart Studs are cast from just the tip of the chosen bacula (if you don’t know what that is google it!).

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass with vermeil post and back and gunmetal plated brass.

~measures roughly 1/4" high

name: raccoon duster
description:
Carefully selected from a table of tiny jars full of various bacula (if you don’t know what that is google it!) this Raccoon Duster went through a multiple mold process in order to attain it’s ergonomic like shape.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 1/4" high 
~ comes in sizes 6/7 and 7/8

options.name: sterling silver with green patina size 6/7
sterling silver with green patina size 7/8

name: raccoon ring
description:
Carefully selected from a table of tiny jars full of various bacula (if you don’t know what that is google it!) this Raccoon Ring is not shaped as Mother Nature intended, be assured!  In fact it went through a multiple mold processes in order to attain its circular shape.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ roughly 1/2" high
~ comes in sizes 8, 9, 10, 11

options.name: sterling silver with green paina size 8
sterling silver with green paina size 9
sterling silver with green paina size 10
sterling silver with green paina size 11

name: skull ring
description:
The skull ring was created years before this Heavy Metal ring became Brooklyn Heavy Metal.  After wrestling with whether we should add it to the collection or not, due to the already over abundance of skull rings, the constant compliments and inquiries about this Skull Ring made us realize the Skull Ring should be thought of as classic! Not cliché.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina and electroplated brass in 18k gold, gunmetal, rose gold, and rhodium*.

~ 1" high by 7/8" wide
 ~ comes in size 7

* rhodium looks like sterling silver with a shinier finish

name: chick pea necklace
description:
To be worn alone or layered, the Chick Pea was designed to be an everyday classic. Subtle, yet bold and unique, this little legume offers up a modern twist on its old school rival bean cousin. Each Chick Pea is cast from the original hand carved wax design.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ chickpea measures roughly 1/2” in diameter 
~ with a 16” chain


* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base

name: pop corn necklace
description:
Like a snowflake or a finger print, each piece of popcorn is unique and different. I came to this realization after many hours of closely examining each individual kernel in a super-sized bag of .99cent popcorn. After many more hours perfecting the original hand-carved wax model, this little charm was born! Worn alone or layered, the Pop Corn is sure to become as beloved as your favorite snack at the movies.

available in sterling silver, sterling silver with green patina*, 18k gold plated brass and gunmetal plated brass.

~ popcorn charm measures roughly 3/4” in diameter 
~ with a 24” chain



* patina slowly rubs off with time revealing sterling silver base
